definition: to use sth to the full/to make the best use of everything
thing/object/matter/abbr. for physics 物理
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The Italians are eminently practical, and everything must have its use.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人讲求实际是出了名的，一切都要物尽其用。

sentences.english: In these conditions, traditional Yakut food always made use of whatever it could.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的条件下，传统的雅库食物总是物尽其用。

sentences.english: that use the internet heavily and use it for what it should be used for.
sentences.chinese: 使用因特网比较多，而且物尽其用。

sentences.english: But are you using it to your best advantage?
sentences.chinese: 但你有没有做到物尽其用呢？

sentences.english: So appreciate whatever material things you already have and make the most of them.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你已经拥有的一切事物并物尽其用吧。

sentences.english: I encourage anyone who shops online to make the most of every dollar.
sentences.chinese: 我鼓励那些在网上购物的人去把每一分钱都物尽其用。

definition: employ one's talent to the fullest/everyone gives of their best/also written 人盡其才|人尽其才
exactly what one would wish/to find one's niche
employ one's talent to the fullest/everyone gives of their best
to satisfy rival demands (idiom)/to get the best of both worlds/to have it both ways/to have one's cake and eat it too
lit. to change something rotten into something magical (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 fu3 xiu3 wei2 shen2 qi2

definition: in surplus
to economize/to conserve (resources)/economy/frugal
one move, two gains (idiom); two birds with one stone
to leave sth unused/to lie idle
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
a kind act that costs nothing
The sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom)./small but complete in every detail
pinyin: ma2 que4 sui1 xiao3 , wu3 zang4 ju4 quan2

definition: each takes what he needs (idiom)
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
